page.title: 10BIDDISHAM VILLAGE
page.content: BIDDISHAM VILLAGE LIES PARTLY ON THE A38 AND PARTLY ON A BY-ROAD WHICH EXTENDS NORTH FROM THE A38 TOWARDS LOXTON BUT IS PREVENTED FROM REACHING IT BY THE RIVER AXE. MOST OF THE HOUSES ARE ABOUT ONE HUNDRED YEARS OLD SITUATED IN PLEASANT GARDENS WHICH REFLECT THE PEACE OF THE SOMERSET COUNTRYSIDE. ALTHOUGH THE SPIRITUAL NEEDS ARE WELL CATERED FOR,THERE ARE NO SHOPS.THE NEAREST VILLAGE STORES IS 2KM WEST AT TARNOCK AND THE NEAREST SHOPPING CENTRE SOME 8KM AWAY AT AXEBRIDGE. APART FROM AGRICULTURE,THERE IS NO LOCAL EMPLOYMENT.
